title: Mikoto Diary
original_name: みこと日記〈ダイアリー〉
sinopse:
Subete Kurumi wakes up one morning with a giant caterpillar on his head. To his shock, the caterpillar turns into a baby! Thus, this marks the end of Subete's normal and quiet life and the start of his crazy life with the mysterious baby Mikoto.

[Written by orithyea]
